about.title: About CyberGuard
about.subtitle: We are on a mission to make enterprise-grade security accessible to every organization

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At CyberGuard, we believe that every organization deserves access to world-class security tools. We are building the platform that makes continuous security monitoring, breach detection, and risk assessment accessible to teams of all sizes.

items.securityDesc: We believe security should be accessible to everyone, not just large enterprises.
items.innovationDesc: Constantly evolving our technology to stay ahead of emerging threats.
items.customerDesc: Your security is our mission. We are here to protect what matters most.
items.globalDesc: Protecting organizations worldwide with 24/7 monitoring and support.

2020.title: Founded
2020.description: CyberGuard was founded with a mission to democratize security.

2021.title: First 1,000 Customers
2021.description: Reached our first milestone of 1,000 organizations protected.

2022.title: Series A Funding
2022.description: Raised $5M to expand our security platform globally.

2024.title: Enterprise Launch
2024.description: Launched enterprise features with dedicated support.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: We are always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for security

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our security services? We would love to hear from you.

faq.title: Quick Answers
faq.responseTimeAnswer: We typically respond within 1-2 hours during business hours. Enterprise customers get priority support with 24/7 emergency response.
faq.support24Answer: Yes! Emergency support is available 24/7 for Enterprise customers. Standard support is available during business hours.
faq.demoAnswer: Absolutely! Our sales team would be happy to schedule a personalized demo at your convenience.

breachDetection.title: Breach Detection

subdomainEnumeration.title: Subdomain Enumeration

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment

emailNotifications.title: Email Notifications

featureBreach.title: Breach Detection
featureBreach.subtitle: Real-time alerts when your credentials appear in data breaches

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our breach detection service monitors data breaches, paste sites, and dark web forums for your credentials. When we find your data, we alert you immediately so you can take action to protect your accounts.

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Get alerted the moment we find your data

historical.title: Historical Checks
historical.description: Check past breaches for your credentials

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.darkWebDesc: Scan dark web forums and marketplaces for your data.
keyFeatures.emailBreachDesc: Get notified when your email appears in a breach.
keyFeatures.passwordDesc: Check if your passwords have been compromised.
keyFeatures.domainDesc: Monitor all email addresses on your domain.
keyFeatures.apiDesc: Integrate breach data into your security tools.
keyFeatures.historicalDesc: Access breach data going back years.

cta.title: Protect Your Credentials
cta.description: Know immediately when your data is compromised

featureScanning.title: Port Scanning
featureScanning.subtitle: Continuous monitoring of open ports and services on your infrastructure

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our port scanning service continuously monitors your infrastructure for open ports and running services. We use a combination of TCP SYN scanning, UDP probing, and service fingerprinting to provide comprehensive visibility into your attack surface.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.automatedDesc: Scheduled scans run automatically to detect new vulnerabilities.
keyFeatures.fingerprintingDesc: Identify running services and versions on open ports.
keyFeatures.vulnerabilityDesc: Detect known CVEs and security misconfigurations.
keyFeatures.historyDesc: Track changes in your attack surface over time.
keyFeatures.protocolDesc: Scan TCP, UDP, and custom protocols.
keyFeatures.rateLimitDesc: Safe scanning that won't overwhelm your systems.

cta.title: Start Scanning Today
cta.description: Get visibility into your attack surface in minutes

featureSSL.title: SSL Certificate Monitoring
featureSSL.subtitle: Track SSL certificate expiry and ensure secure connections for your users

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our SSL monitoring service continuously checks your certificates for expiry, configuration issues, and security vulnerabilities. We validate the entire certificate chain and alert you to potential problems before they impact your users.

expiry.title: Expiry Monitoring
expiry.description: Never let a certificate expire unexpectedly

security.title: Security Validation
security.description: Check for best practices and vulnerabilities

alerts.title: Instant Alerts
alerts.description: Get notified immediately of any issues

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.expiryDesc: Get notified 30, 14, and 7 days before certificate expiration.
keyFeatures.chainDesc: Verify the complete certificate chain for trust issues.
keyFeatures.protocolDesc: Ensure TLS 1.2+ is enabled and weak protocols disabled.
keyFeatures.transparencyDesc: Monitor CT logs for unauthorized certificates.
keyFeatures.cipherDesc: Identify weak or deprecated cipher suites.
keyFeatures.multiDomainDesc: Monitor certificates across all your domains.

cta.title: Protect Your Certificates
cta.description: Never let an expired certificate disrupt your business

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your organization's security needs

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams getting started

trial.question: Can I try before I buy?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial on all paid plans. No credit card required.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfers for Enterprise plans.

change.question: Can I change plans later?
change.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

discount.question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
discount.answer: Yes! Save 20% when you pay annually on Professional plans.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Our team is here to help you find the right plan.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.trustBadge: GDPR Compliant â€¢ CCPA Ready â€¢ SOC2 Type II

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: CyberGuard ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our security monitoring platform.
introduction.commitmentText: We believe in transparency and giving you control over your data. This policy outlines our practices in clear, simple language.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We may collect information about you in various ways:

account.title: Account Information
account.desc: Name, email address, company name, and domain information.

security.title: Security Data
security.desc: Domain scan results, breach detection data, and risk assessments.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.desc: Information about how you interact with our platform.

device.title: Device Information
device.desc: IP address, browser type, and device identifiers.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, operate, and maintain our security monitoring services
Send security alerts and notifications about detected threats
Improve our services and develop new features
Communicate with you about updates and support
Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption at rest and in transit, regular security assessments, and access controls.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Security scan data may be retained for up to 2 years for historical analysis and compliance purposes. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services for breach detection databases, email delivery, and analytics. These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are not permitted to use your information for any purpose other than providing services to us.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser. Essential cookies are required for the platform to function properly.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
contact.responseTime: Response time: Within 24-48 hours on business days

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your security is our top priority. We build our platform with security at every layer.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Hosted on AWS with SOC 2 Type II certified data centers and 24/7 monitoring.

access.title: Access Controls
access.description: Role-based access control (RBAC) with multi-factor authentication for all users.

audit.title: Audit Logging
audit.description: Comprehensive audit logs for all actions with immutable storage.

residency.title: Data Residency
residency.description: Choose where your data is stored with our regional data centers.

incident.title: Incident Response
incident.description: Dedicated security team with 24/7 incident response capabilities.

practices.title: Our Security Practices
practices.item2: Annual security audits by independent firms
practices.item3: Mandatory cybersecurity training for all employees
practices.item6: Incident response plans and disaster recovery programs

vulnerability.title: Report a Vulnerability
vulnerability.description: We appreciate responsible disclosure of security vulnerabilities. If you discover a security issue, please report it to our security team.
vulnerability.responseTime: We respond to security reports within 24 hours

dataProtection.title: Your Data, Your Control
dataProtection.description: We never sell your data. You maintain full ownership and control over your information. Delete your data at any time, no questions asked.
dataProtection.badges: Data Ownership, Right to Delete, No Data Selling, GDPR Compliant

cta.title: Have Security Questions?
cta.description: Our security team is available to discuss your organization's specific security requirements

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.trustBadge: Legally Binding â€¢ Enterprise Grade â€¢ 100% Compliant

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using CyberGuard's security monitoring platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use this service.
acceptance.importantText: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and CyberGuard. Please read them carefully.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.intro: CyberGuard provides enterprise security monitoring services including:

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to protect your account.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: You agree to use CyberGuard only for lawful purposes:
rules: You must have authorization to scan any domains or IP addresses you add to the platform
You may not use the service to harm, exploit, or attack third-party systems
You may not attempt to reverse engineer or compromise our security systems
You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations
You may not resell or redistribute our services without written permission
You must not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose

payment.title: 5. Subscription and Payment
payment.content: Some features require a paid subscription. You agree to pay all fees associated with your account. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date. Prices may change with 30 days notice.

data.title: 6. Data and Content
data.content: You retain ownership of data you submit to CyberGuard. You grant us a license to process this data solely for providing our services. We may use anonymized, aggregated data to improve our services and for security research.

serviceLevel.title: 7. Service Level
serviceLevel.content: We strive to maintain 99.9% uptime for our services. We do not guarantee uninterrupted access and are not liable for temporary service interruptions. We will provide notice of scheduled maintenance when possible.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: CyberGuard is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you in the 12 months preceding the claim.

indemnification.title: 9. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless CyberGuard and its affiliates from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. You may cancel your subscription at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service and your data will be removed within 30 days.

intellectualProperty.title: 11. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: CyberGuard and its associated trademarks, logos, and content are our property. You may not use our branding or content without written permission. Our software and algorithms are protected by copyright and trade secret laws.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the platform. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration or in courts of competent jurisdiction.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
contact.responseTime: Response time: Legal inquiries typically answered within 2-3 business days
